messages.subject: Education Choices Issue 3

messages.messageBody:
I'm not sure if it's okay to post this notice here, but I'm
enthusastic about this new magazine (I would be - I'm a regular
contributor, plus getting a commercially available magazine about home
education into the newsagents in Australia has been a goal of mine for
over a decade).

This magazine celebrates learning at home and in the community. The
contributors generally lean towards unschooling or are unschoolers. It
doesn't have a narrow focus as to be commercially viable it needs to
cover all home educating bases...

Education Choices, Australia's first commercially available home
education magazine, is now on sale for AUS$8. Ask for it at your local
newsagent or purchase from Always Learning Books -
www.alwayslearningbooks.com.au [see Magazines]

In this issue:

* Special Needs - Bullying in School
* Beyond Homeschooling - Career Choices
* Teens Write
* Legal - Youth Allowance and Home Education
* Spring into Science
* Competitions
* All the Answers
* Important Lessons
* Practical Tips
* Diary
* Health and Wellbeing - Focus on the Family
* Diagnosing Mental Illness in Children
* Teenage Depression
... and more ...

for information on how to subscribe contact Beverley
email: contact@...
phone: 0424789582
www.educationchoices.com.au
